description: Bottlebrushbush is an amazing species of bush with its bright red and yellow hues that light up any garden! This Australian shrub has been around for centuries and is great for a variety of uses, including screening, hedging, informal borders, and windbreaks. Bottlebrushbush is low maintenance and drought tolerant, making it ideal for tough climates, and its flowers attract a variety of birds and native wildlife. Growing from 5-7 feet, it also adds height and vibrancy to a garden. All in all, a truly amazing species!
